text: To follow up on this, there's a different, odd way you can accomplish the same thing it seems, I discovered from HubSpot's boilerplate. Instead of doing `{{ some_variable && some_other_variable }}`, you can do `{{ some_other_variable if some_variable }}` . I would much prefer using `&&` though, thinking about it backwards like that hurts my head. >< But it's what we've got, so just going to have to get used to using it.
I wish global theme settings were more integrated with modules in general, so we could do things like have a field's default value get inherited from a global theme setting value.
